sub_title: Delivery Lead | Project Management | Products Industry | Product Life Cycle Management | Warehouse Management | SAP
summary:
Walter is a Senior Manager who is with Accenture for 11 years and have been involved in multiple technology implementations for clients within the Products and High Tech and Communications industry. 

During these implementations Walter worked as a delivery lead using standard delivery tools and methods to plan, monitor and control delivery as well as functional lead consultant on gather requirements, design, deploy and test both inside as outside the Netherlands. Operating comfortably in waterfall and agile environments.
 
Walter is educated in Business Informatics (MSc) at Utrecht University and distinguishes himself by a solution-oriented mindset who derives fulfillment from accomplishments. With a constantly strive to learn and improve and a focus on working together, in order to deliver high performance solutions.

SAP Knowledge on: PLM, LE -WM, SD, MM, IM and GTS.

projects.title: Project Manager European MES / MOM Implementation at Global Food Corporation
projects.description: Project manager of European MES / MOM implementation. Scope includes the introduction and or enhancement of Savigent, Uniwin, OSI PI, and BPS systems as well as the integration of these systems with the ERP layer for 13 factories.

contributors.headline: Delivery Lead | Project Management | Products Industry | Product Life Cycle Management | Warehouse Management | SAP

projects.title: Work Stream Lead at Leading fast moving consumer goods supplier
projects.description:
• SAP PLM
• Project Management

PLM will deliver the future digital workbench for product development at Unilever by connecting the core systems through one common data backbone, reducing the need for rekeying and searching for data and always working with one version of the truth. 

Responsibilities as work stream lead are to use standard delivery tools and methods to plan, monitor and control delivery for high-quality and predictable outcomes for programs, projects and/or managed services. Analyze, design and/or develop best practice business changes through technology solutions.

Skills used are project management, consultancy, SAP PLM, MM, requirements gathering, process design, functional design, testing, supply chain, product lifecycle management.

Responsible for requirements gathering, planning, analyzing and designing the global business processes around SAP (PLM) EH&S Specification Management. Lead of team with 7 team members.

contributors.headline: Delivery Lead | Project Management | Products Industry | Product Life Cycle Management | Warehouse Management | SAP

projects.title: Application Development Lead at Leading fast moving consumer goods supplier
projects.description:
• SAP PLM
• Project Management

Lead of The Application Development (AD) team. Responsible for the delivery of requested changes which are delivered in the minor releases. The AD team is responsible for
» “Complex” bug fixes (which are “escalated” by AM team)
» New demand
» Test Scripts – update for changes delivered by AD, approve for changes delivered by AM
» Functional, Technical and other design documents – update for changes delivered by AD, approve for changes delivered by AM
» Regression Testing
» Liaison with Product Vendor

As the team lead, Walter’s responsibilities are: 
» Liaison with business to define the change requirement 
» Liaison with development to derive a solution for the changes 
» Liaison with demand management and release manage to define scope of each release
» Serve as a functional consultant for design, built and testing of the changes
» Plan resources for each release
» Plan and coordinate regression testing 
» Manage expectation of stakeholder regarding Business as usual change requests.

projects.title: Global based SAP PLM Implementation at Leading fast moving consumer goods supplier
projects.description:
• SAP PLM
• Deployment Specialist
• Change Management

PLM will deliver the future digital workbench for product development at Unilever by connecting the core systems through one common data backbone, reducing the need for rekeying and searching for data and always working with one version of the truth. 

In the roll as SAP PLM deployment specialist Walter executes deployment-related tasks including work planning, scheduling, metrics, training, pilots and resourcing in several countries around the globe (e.g. China, India, Brazil, US, UK, Netherlands) in order to ensure a well spread adoption and successful delivery.

contributors.headline: Delivery Lead | Project Management | Products Industry | Product Life Cycle Management | Warehouse Management | SAP

projects.title: Application Maintenance Transition at ASML
projects.description:
Support the setup of a shared service center (SSC) that will provide clear processes for both Agile and Waterfall projects with robust mechanisms for quality control.

Walter his responsibility was the creation of a daily operational procedures document that describes the interfaces between ASML, SSC and third parties for the development work of SAP, JAVA and TIBCO. The document sets out the phases and procedures related to the interfaces agreed between SSC, ASML and third parties in order to effectively manage both the shared service center and the relationship.

contributors.headline: Delivery Lead | Project Management | Products Industry | Product Life Cycle Management | Warehouse Management | SAP

projects.title: United States based SAP WMS implementation at ASML
projects.description:
•    SAP Inventory / Warehouse Management
•    SAP LE / MM
•    RF Terminals / wireless network / SAP Console

In 2011 the Inbound Logistics II project had been rolled out in the Veldhoven plant. Goal of the Inbound Logistics II Project is to improve the efficiency of the inbound and return processes.  To this end a SAP WMS solution with Handling Unit Management has been implemented to facilitate Client specific warehouse processes (Receipt, Put-Away, Picking, Cleaning, etc.) on a handheld RF scanner. 

The solution implemented previously in Veldhoven will be rolled-out to the Wilton plant. Some modifications to the solution are necessary to cover gaps between the way processes are executed in Veldhoven versus Wilton. Additional challenge is that the project is partly executed on site in Wilton (United States).

Walter his responsibilities were:
•   Execute unit and integration test
•   Support user acceptance test
•   Create training plan / materials
•   Prepare training system for training
•   Conversion activities executed on site in Wilton
•   Aftercare support executed on site in Wilton 
•   Implementing complex RFC’s

contributors.headline: Delivery Lead | Project Management | Products Industry | Product Life Cycle Management | Warehouse Management | SAP

projects.title: Taiwan based SAP implementation at ASML
projects.description:
• SAP Inventory / Warehouse Management
• SAP LE / MM / SD

Goal is to set up three new plants in SAP. One plant for volume production and pas refurbishment located in Taiwan, one Taiwanese owned plant located in the Netherlands in order to be able to order directly from EU suppliers ‘acting as a hub for the Taiwanese factory demand’ and one Dutch owned plant located in Taiwan responsible for the sales and delivery handling.

Extra key challenges during the project were the strict deadlines, set by a SAP-freeze needed to support the SAP-upgrade and working in a multi-cultural project team partly onsite in Taiwan.

Walter his responsibilities as functional design lead  were executing the design and implementation activities for the creation of these plants including analyzing and designing/re-designing business processes and/or defining parts of the organization. Furthermore, Walter was responsible for UAT testing and aftercare that both took place in Taiwan.

contributors.headline: Delivery Lead | Project Management | Products Industry | Product Life Cycle Management | Warehouse Management | SAP

projects.title: SAP GTS implementation at ASML
projects.description:
•  SAP GTS

Goal is to set up correct preferential country of origin determination for (manufactured) parts, including printing on shipping / export documents and obtaining origin declarations of procured parts from suppliers. 

Walter his responsibilities as test lead were supporting SAP configuration/customizing activities and functioning as team lead responsible for testing and aftercare.

projects.description:
• SAP Inventory / Warehouse Management 
• SAP LE / MM

Goal is to improve the efficiency of the inbound and return processes in order to generate savings. To this end a SAP WMS solution with Handling Unit Management has been implemented to facilitate Client specific warehouse processes (Receipt, Put-Away, Picking, Cleaning, etc.) on a handheld RF scanner.

Walter his responsibilities as functional design specialist were:
• Analyze as-is situation
• Create functional designs and process designs
• Create test scripts
• Create test data
• Create test planning
• Execute unit and integration test
• Plan and coordinate UAT

profile_positions.description: Write master thesis in order to answer the following research question "What root causes bring about that - despite our knowledge of and solutions on IT project management failures - the desired level of project management success in IT projects is still not reached".

volunteer_experiences.description: UAF informs, supports and advises highly educated refugees in order to help them find a suitable job. As a coach you will support an UAF refugee-student (the mentee) to help him/her orientate on the Dutch labor market by enhancing his/her professional network and by sharing your knowledge and skills.
